bool shouldCheckParsing ( const std::string &  a1,
const std::string &  a2 
)

determines whether tokens with analytical functions a1 and a2 should be checked against parsing graph provided by tool_chain (ie if the edge between them should be removed if there is no edge in the parsing graph). For example, auxiliary words should not be checked as they may form too many kinds of relations

Parameters:
a1 A function of the first token
a2 A function of the second token
Returns:
true if the tokens should be checked, false if not
